title: "USAA overhauls mobile app after 10 years"
excerpt: "USAA was one of the first to offer mobile check deposit and was an early user of app-based intelligent assistants. The San Antonio bank and insurance company for military members is continuing to evolve with an overhaul of its mobile app for the first time since it released the app 10 years ago."
